newsitem.title: UK: N. Sea Jan Forties programme up to 28.8 mln barrel.
newsitem.headline: N. Sea Jan Forties programme up to 28.8 mln barrel.

text.p: About 28.8 million barrels of North Sea Forties crude oil are scheduled to load in January, up from 27.9 million barrels in December, traders said.

The January Forties programme will consist of one cargo of one million barrels, one cargo of 650,000 barrels, 26 cargoes of 600,000 barrels each, 20 cargoes of 500,000 barrels each and the usual 1.55 million barrels which will go directly free-in-pipe to operator BP's Grangemouth refinery.
In December, the Forties programme was made up of 28 cargoes of 600,000 barrels each, 18 cargoes of 500,000 barrels each, one 530,000 barrel cargo and 1.5 million for Grangemouth.
